regen.absent_element: notification or confirmation of successful batch updates or budget changes
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide a notification or confirmation to users upon completion of batch project updates or budget monitoring actions.

regen.absent_element: alert mechanism for budget overflows or shortfalls
regen.new_specification: The system shall alert the user if a project's budget exceeds or falls below the predefined thresholds.

regen.absent_element: real-time notifications for budget updates or changes
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide real-time notifications to users when there are significant changes or overruns in project budgets.

label: The system shall warn users if the project budget exceeds funding.
